name: 2D Platformer (dshh)
description:
This game is assignment for course from Coursera. 

My 3 significant changes:

I created 2 power-ups, for which there are own scripts, new behaviour and art. You can see both power-ups on first screenshot from Level 1. First power up looks like scull and if you will touch it, you will loose one life. Second power-up looks like green poisoned chest (it also could be seen on first screenshot), if you will touch it, you will loose significant amount of XP. I guess it should be counted as 4 changes - behaviour and drawing but if not then 3rd change is new unique levels.
